fields.title: Views
fields.info: Number of views on the NIAID Data Ecosystem.

fields.title: DOI
fields.info: Digital Object Identifier (DOI) associated with the record.

fields.title: Infectious Agent
fields.info: Infectious agent / pathogen associated with the record.

fields.title: Infectious Disease
fields.info: Health condition associated with the record, such as an infectious disease or chronic condition.

fields.title: Variable Measured
fields.info: The variables that are measured by the dataset.

fields.title: Measurement Technique
fields.info: The experimental or analytical technique(s) that were used to generate the dataset, or what techniques are the focus of the computational tool.
